alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Amateurs have a much better grasp of the realities of astronomy because they really look at pictures of galaxies and stars. Professionals start out with a theory and only see those details which can be interpreted in terms of that theory."

- Halton Arp, Seeing Red, p.23
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Halton Arp on Amateur Astronomers
